<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="#aa65329b5907f07ee90e3e0509014d77b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t <a href="#aa65329b5907f07ee90e3e0509014d77b">computeBucketCount</a>(uint32&#95;t NumStrings) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is a precomputed list of Buckets given the specified number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// strings.  Matching the reference algorithm exactly is not strictly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// necessary for correctness, but it helps when comparing LLD&#39;s PDBs with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Microsoft&#39;s PDBs so as to eliminate superfluous differences.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The reference implementation does (in nmt.h, NMT::grow()):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   unsigned StringCount = 0;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   unsigned BucketCount = 1;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   fn insert() &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     ++StringCount;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     if (BucketCount &#42; 3 / 4 &lt; StringCount)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       BucketCount = BucketCount &#42; 3 / 2 + 1;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This list contains all StringCount, BucketCount pairs where BucketCount was</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// just incremented.  It ends before the first BucketCount entry where</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BucketCount &#42; 3 would overflow a 32-bit unsigned int.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint32&#95;t, uint32&#95;t&gt; StringsToBuckets&#91;&#93; = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;0, 1&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;1, 2&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;2, 4&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;4, 7&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;6, 11&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;9, 17&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;13, 26&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;20, 40&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;31, 61&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;46, 92&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#123;70, 139&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write a hash table.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t BucketCount = <a href="#aa65329b5907f07ee90e3e0509014d77b">computeBucketCount</a>(Strings.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/debugstringtablesubsection/#a3de33b237562e35ec577f74019f7dc71">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;ulittle32&#95;t&gt; Buckets(BucketCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Pair : Strings) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> S = Pair.getKey();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = Pair.getValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t Hash = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a1737ab2b5a4c39b8eb3fcbd2e47abb65">hashStringV1</a>(S);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != BucketCount; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a5dbb1abfb6d3c14555304f9c56703234a9234cc57c43f272b55a94b0069fe62d1">Slot</a> = (Hash + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) % BucketCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Buckets&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a5dbb1abfb6d3c14555304f9c56703234a9234cc57c43f272b55a94b0069fe62d1">Slot</a>&#93; != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">      Buckets&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a5dbb1abfb6d3c14555304f9c56703234a9234cc57c43f272b55a94b0069fe62d1">Slot</a>&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC = Writer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a1e5febb5c471f88c785519a211871b01">writeArray</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;ulittle32&#95;t&gt;</a>(Buckets)))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timetracescope">llvm::TimeTraceScope</a> timeScope(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Commit strings table&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter">BinaryStreamWriter</a> SectionWriter;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::tie(SectionWriter, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer">Writer</a>) = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer">Writer</a>.split(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pdb/pdbstringtableheader">PDBStringTableHeader</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
